text: Alix Balmir is a Haitian diplomat He has been ambassador to Venezuela and to Colombia, and is currently ambassador to Panama. His youngest daughter, Stéphanie Balmir Villedrouin, is a minister within President Michel Martelly’s cabinet. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Haitian diplomats Category:Haitian people of Mulatto descent Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Alix Balmir
